thread.title: Vin Diesel reveals daughter's sweet texts
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel reveals daughter's sweet texts

title: Vin Diesel reveals daughter's sweet texts
text:
Vin Diesel Reveals The Sweet Texts He Gets From His Daughter Katherine Biek 6:40 AM, Oct 15, 2015 
Photo Credit: Getty Images / Kevin Winter 
Vin Diesel's daughter has a cell phone. Now, she's only 7 years old, but we think the adorable texts she sends her father totally make up for it. 
"Hi, Daddy! I love you so much. I am so proud of you. I miss you so much. I believe in you — that you will make an awesome movie," Diesel read from his phone while on "The Tonight Show." 
Diesel shared the sweet message from his oldest daughter Wednesday night while promoting his newest film, "The Last Witch Hunter," on "The Tonight Show." It turns out, she sent him that text message while filming the movie. 
Of course, as Jimmy Fallon pointed out, Diesel's daughter will have to wait a few years to see her dad in the movie, since "The Last Witch Hunter" has some pretty adult themes. 
Thank goodness she can still watch — we mean hear — Diesel in "Guardians of the Galaxy" in the meantime. 
This video includes images from Getty Images.
